Name: De Ooievaar
Review Text: Unique artisanal distillery. The only one left of it's kind in Amsterdam. The distillery distills over 200 (!) jenevers and liquors. There are many historical liquors with interesting stories attached to them. And, they make the best, most …

Name: De Ooievaar
Review Text: Very nice liquers. Was a bit hard to buy something. Rang several doorbells on serveral doors before someone opened the door.
